description: This file defines a data model for movie scripts using Pydantic, sets up an agent with Azure OpenAI model to generate movie scripts, and executes a sample run to generate and pretty-print a movie script based on the prompt 'New York'.

classes.name: MovieScript
classes.description: A Pydantic model representing the structure of a movie script with fields for setting, ending, genre, name, characters, and storyline.

methods.name: Agent
methods.description: Initializes an agent with a specified model, description, and response model.

methods.name: RunResponse
methods.description: Represents the response from running the agent, including the generated content.
